overview: A young woman on the edge of a half constructed building top trying to jump off. But a voice talks to her. It's a man. He tells her it's a matter of the last second thought which step her away from jumping. They start taking and decide to run away. So their story unveils while they travel around and across the country.
tagline: අසමත් රාජ්‍යයක out of focus ජීවිතයක්
title: Soosthi
